subSubSection.paragraph: MEXICO : Temascaltepec, Tejupilco—Hinton ( 1937 c, 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).

MEXICO : Morelos, Cuernavaca, Temascaltepec, Tejupilco—Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).
BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Nova Teutônia—Hinton ( 1969 ). PARAGUAY : Paraguarí, Presidente Haynes—Shepard and Julio ( 2010 ).

?

BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Águas Mornas (=Theresopolis)—Grouvelle ( 1889 ), Passos et al . ( 2009 ).

Hexacylloepus granulosus , Hinton, 1940 d: 333
GUATEMALA : Paraíso—Sharp ( 1882 ).
PANAMA : Volcán de Chiriquí—Sharp ( 1882 ).
FRENCH GUIANA : St. Laurent du Maroni—Hinton ( 1939 a), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).
MEXICO : Temascaltepec, Tejupilco, Sierra de Durango—Hinton ( 1937 c, 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).
BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Nova Teutônia—Hinton ( 1937 a, 1940 d). PARAGUAY : Guairá, Paraguarí—Shepard and Julio ( 2010 ).
ECUADOR : Napo—Monte and Mascagni ( 2012 ). VENEZUELA : Yaracuy—Hinton ( 1973 b).

Hexacylloepus nothrus Spangler, 1966
Hexacylloepus nothrus Spangler, 1966 : 408
PERU : Tulumayo –Spangler ( 1966 ).

Hexacylloepus nunezi Hinton, 1973 b: 253
VENEZUELA : Carabobo—Hinton ( 1973 b).
BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Nova Teutônia—Hinton ( 1937 a, 1940 d).

Hexacylloepus quadratus
?
CUBA : Soledad, Cienfuegos– Darlington (1927, 1936).
MEXICO : Morelos, Cuernavaca—Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).
GRENADA : Mount Gay, St. John’s River—Grouvelle ( 1898 ), Blackwelder ( 1944 ), Hinton ( 1971 d). TOBAGO : Providence River—Hinton ( 1971 d).

TRINIDAD : Maraval River, St. Ann’s River, Curumpalo River, Curucaye River, Cimaronero River, St. Cruz River, Tacarigua River, Garden River, Maracas Valley, Cuare River, Mausica River, St. Joseph River, Arima River— Hinton ( 1971 d).
VENEZUELA :?—Hinton ( 1973 b).

Hexacylloepus smithi bejuma Hinton, 1973 b: 255
VENEZUELA : Carabobo, Bejuma—Hinton ( 1973 b).
BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Águas Mornas (=Theresopolis)– Grouvelle ( 1889 ), Passos et al . ( 2009 ).
